QuestData.Title: Tenuous Negotiations
QuestData.Description: From what I've learned about these water-goblins, this should work.$b$bI've crafted a shark-tooth necklace from the items you scrounged up. Not only is it a shiny trinket, but it's a memento of Gnaws' death. There's no telling how many gilblins were eaten alive by that monster.$b$bOffer the necklace to the gilblin leader. In exchange, I need an artifact called The Pewter Pounder.$b$bAnd be quick about it, kid. I'm already beginning to miss my flesh...
